About Me

A little something about me and my experience...

BIO

I am a Full Stack Developer with experience in Ruby on Rails and JavaScript-based programming. I have a background in Marketing and Administration coupled with strong communication, technology, and problem-solving skills. I am passionate about joining a company where I can further develop and utilize my programming skills.
When I am away from my computer and not coding, I like to read self-motivational books, cook, hike, or travel. You will most likely find me skydiving in another country.
